page.title: 20The Shenstone Garage
page.content: The Shenstone garage is at the bottom of Church Hill Road and it's on the left. It's near the A5127. It has a range of prices of cars from about 2,895 Pounds to 5,095 Pounds. There is also a range of cars like Cavelairs, Hatchbacks, Metros, Renaults, Peugout and Minis. Church Hill road slopes down towards the A5127. The garage is on the left when your going down and on the right when your coming up. The entrance to it is in Church Hill Road and the exit is on the A5127. Some times the garage is self service and another time it might not be. They self Gulf and Diesel petrol. It is 1.99 Pounds for 1 gallon of 4 star and 1.68 Pounds for a gallon of 2 star. They also do M.O.T's which is a test for a car every 3 years. GARETH JONES
